title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse! 

Experience smooth and precise cursor control with its trackball design and 300 DPI sensitivity. This mouse is equipped with both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, making it versatile and compatible with a wide range of devices. 

Available in vibrant red, sleek gray, and classic white, this mouse not only performs well but also looks great on your desk. With side-to-side scrolling and two buttons for easy navigation, this mouse is perfect for both left and right-handed users. 

Upgrade your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Buy yours today and see the difference in control and comfort!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - the perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality! This sleek mouse offers both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, making it versatile and easy to use with any device. With a high DPI of 300, you can enjoy smooth and precise cursor control.

Available in vibrant colors like red, gray, and white, this mouse is not only practical but also aesthetically pleasing. The trackball feature allows for effortless navigation, while the side-to-side scrolling makes browsing a breeze. Perfect for both left-handed and right-handed users, this mouse caters to everyone's needs.

Compact and ergonomic, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is designed for comfort and efficiency. Don't miss out on this top-quality product from Logitech, proudly made in China. Upgrade your workspace today with this stylish and reliable trackball mouse!
